00024 #ifndef _SCOPED_ARRAY_HPP_
00025 #define _SCOPED_ARRAY_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 namespace pwiz {
00029 namespace util {
00030 
00031 
00032 template <typename T>
00033 class scoped_array
00034 {
00035     public:
00036 
00037     explicit scoped_array(unsigned long size = 0)
00038     :   size_(size),
00039         data_(new T[size_])
00040     {}
00041 
00042     unsigned long size() const {return size_;}
00043 
00044     T* data() {return data_;}
00045     const T* data() const {return data_;}
00046 
00047     T* begin() {return data_;}
00048     const T* begin() const {return data_;}
00049     T* end() {return data_+size_;}
00050     const T* end() const {return data_+size_;}
00051 
00052     T& operator[](int index) {return data_[index];} 
00053     const T& operator[](int index) const {return data_[index];} 
00054 
00055     void resize(unsigned long size)
00056     {
00057         T* temp = new T[size];
00058         delete [] data_;
00059         data_ = temp;
00060         size_ = size;
00061     }
00062 
00063     ~scoped_array() {delete [] data_;}
00064 
00065     private:
00066     unsigned long size_;
00067     T* data_;
00068 
00069     scoped_array(scoped_array&);
00070     scoped_array& operator=(scoped_array&);
00071 };
00072 
00073 
00074 } // namespace util
00075 } // namespace pwiz
00076 
00077 
00078 #endif // _SCOPED_ARRAY_HPP_
